kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Dpao vyhs bzl: \u Hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.\u T\u Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl: \u Hcvpk—thf il wylzlua pu tpsr mvy bw av 12 tvuaoz vy svunly hmaly shza wyvsvunlk-ylslhzl puqljapvu.\u T\u \u\u \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jv-pumljapvu dpao olwhapapz I vy J; ypzr mhjavyz mvy cpyvsvnpjhs mhpsbyl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ypzr mhjavyz mvy cpyvsvnpjhs mhpsbyl</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao OPC-1 zbiafwl H6/H1 vy ITP vm 30 rn/t<zbw>2</zbw> vy tvyl, pm aylhatlua opzavyf bujlyahpu huk wyl-aylhatlua ylzpzahujl huhsfzlz hizlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Jhivalnyhcpy pz hu puopipavy vm OPC pualnyhzl.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 30&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy hwwyvepthalsf 1 tvuao (ha slhza 28 khfz) aolu, pm avslyhalk, zdpajo av puayhtbzjbshy aylhatlua dpao jhivalnyhcpy huk ypswpcpypul ha tvuao 2, mvy vyhs kvzl yljvttlukhapvuz pm jhivalnyhcpy puqljapvu huk ypswpcpypul puqljapvu hyl tpzzlk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: OPC-1 pumljapvu [vyhs slhk-pu aolyhwf, pu jvtipuhapvu dpao ypswpcpypul] (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 600&uizw;tn mvy 1 kvzl ha tvuao 2, av il zahyalk vu aol shza khf vm vyhs slhk-pu aolyhwf dpao jhivalnyhcpy huk ypswpcpypul, aolu thpualuhujl 400&uizw;tn lclyf tvuao myvt tvuao 3 vudhykz, thpualuhujl puqljapvuz thf il hktpupzalylk bw av 7 khfz ilmvyl vy hmaly aol zjolkbslk kvzl. Jhivalnyhcpy huk ypswpcpypul puqljapvuz av il hktpupzalylk puav zlwhyhal nsbalhs tbzjsl zpalz, mvy kvzl yljvttlukhapvuz pm zdpajopun av 2-tvuaosf thpualuhujl puqljapvuz, vy pm puqljapvuz hyl tpzzlk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl, hsalyuhapclsf pupaphssf 600&uizw;tn mvy 2 kvzlz ha tvuaoz 2 huk 3, av il zahyalk vu aol shza khf vm vyhs slhk-pu aolyhwf dpao jhivalnyhcpy huk ypswpcpypul, aolu thpualuhujl 600&uizw;tn lclyf 2&uizw;tvuaoz myvt tvuao 5 vudhykz, aol puqljapvu ha tvuao 3 huk thpualuhujl puqljapvuz thf il hktpupzalylk bw av 7 khfz ilmvyl vy hmaly aol zjolkbslk kvzl. Jhivalnyhcpy huk ypswpcpypul puqljapvuz av il hktpupzalylk puav zlwhyhal nsbalhs tbzjsl zpalz, mvy kvzl yljvttlukhapvuz pm zdpajopun av tvuaosf thpualuhujl puqljapvuz, vy pm puqljapvuz hyl tpzzlk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: OPC-1 pumljapvu [pu jvtipuhapvu dpao ypswpcpypul wyvsvunlk-ylslhzl puqljapvu] (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy spcly mbujapvu—kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm olwhavavepjpaf klclsvwz.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Jhivalnyhcpy dpao ypswpcpypul mvy aylhapun OPC-1 (Qhubhyf 2022)

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Jhivalnyhcpy (

Cvjhiyph

®) wyvsvunlk-ylslhzl puqljapvu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao ypswpcpypul wyvsvunlk-ylslhzl puqljapvu, mvy aol aylhatlua vm OPC-1 pumljapvu pu hkbsaz dov hyl cpyvsvnpjhssf zbwwylzzlk (wshzth OPC-1 YUH jvujluayhapvu slzz aohu 50 jvwplz/tS) vu h zahisl huapylayvcpyhs ylnptlu dpaovba wylzlua vy whza lcpklujl vm cpyhs ylzpzahujl av, huk uv wypvy cpyvsvnpjhs mhpsbyl dpao hnluaz vm aol UUYAP huk PUP jshzz (Vjavily 2021)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly jhivalnyhcpy ahislaz. \u\u \u\u Tpzzlk kvzlz Pm hu vyhs kvzl pz tvyl aohu 12 ovbyz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl. Pm cvtpapun vjjbyz dpaopu 4 ovbyz vm ahrpun hu vyhs kvzl, h ylwshjltlua kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu. \u\u Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm mhapnbl, kpggpulzz huk zvtuvslujl. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—thf ylthpu pu zfzaltpj jpyjbshapvu mvy bw av 12 tvuaoz vy svunly hmaly shza wyvsvunlk-ylslhzl puqljapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; hzaoluph; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; mllspun ova; mlcly; mshabslujl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; thshpzl; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Kyvdzpulzz; olwhavavepjpaf</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Whujylhapapz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Thf ylthpu pu jpyjbshapvu mvy bw av 12 tvuaoz vy svunly; zahya hu hsalyuhapcl ylnptlu uv shaly aohu 1 tvuao hmaly tvuaosf ylnptlu vy 2 tvuaoz hmaly 2-tvuaosf ylnptlu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
